relationships.description: Harry is watching Joey Jenkins belt a Bludger towards Ballycastle Bats Chaser.
Hermione is teasing Harry about the golden egg, suggesting he should open it to figure out what it means.
Ron is defending Harry from Hermione's teasing, saying he has earned a break.
Fred and George arrive at the table with a prank, which involves blowing up the castle model.
